attributes.action: No religious sentiments on London buses, say no to Glory To Allah signs.
attributes.background: This is a deeply offensive religious sentiment, given the specific issues we have in the world with this particular religion and shows undue bias for that religion, as such it is not appropriate in our capital city that any one specific faith be shown out of the many that Londoners observe.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. Transport for London, which is responsible for buses in London, is accountable to the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/mayor-assembly/london-assembly/take-part/petitions
